sections.description: Provides markdown endpoints for AI/LLM consumption. Adds .md URLs, /llms.txt index, and "Copy for LLM" buttons.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • Added blog-filters, blog-search, and blog-category-filter blocks
  • Added shared helper classes for block rendering
  • Added self-hosted plugin updates via GitHub releases

1.1.0

  • Migrated to WordPress Interactivity API
  • Added Block Supports for button styling

1.0.0

  • Initial release
  • Added /llms.txt endpoint
  • Added .md endpoints for posts and pages
  • Added copy-button and view-button blocks
